description:
**PROOF OF MY EARNINGS IN THE PROMOTIONAL VIDEO ABOVE**

My Udemy courses have been taken by over 20,000 students, who have achieved tangible real-life results from my teachings, which are straight-to-the-point and no BS!

LATEST: Course Updated Again for 2016 - Let's make this year a good one with your first successful product launch!

No prior experience is needed.

About this course:

  • Over two hours of HD video lectures, and in-depth over the shoulder information.
  • Over 100 5 stars reviews attributed to me by my students
  • Full, free lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free (and there will be MANY :)
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!
  • You also get full, free, unrestricted, access to any of my other courses, just choose one! (they usually cost around $300)

OBJECTIVE OF THIS COURSE ? ACHIEVE WHAT I DID:

  • My last launch grossed $17k in its first week (proof in the promotional video)
  • Grew my email list from 500 to over 6k subscribers
  • Created a passive stream of income and allowed me to sell high-ticket coaching programs.

.... and I truly believe it when I say anyone can achieve this, with the right guidance.

Today, you will learn how you can build a in-demand product, along with a complete sales page, and recruit an army of affiliates in only one week.

Your initial goal is an easy $5,000 from your first launch.

My courses have been taken by over 20,000 students already - my reputation speaks for itself.

Whether you already have experience in the world of internet marketing, or you are just getting started this very moment, you too can get the same results as I have ... we cover everything!

You'll learn

  1. How to find a topic for your product in a matter of minutes (in-demand)
  2. The right way to name your product without the headache
  3. How to quickly design an A+ sales page using readymade templates
  4. How to recruit high-end JVs to promote your product, and make hands off income.
  5. The exact method I use to create products in 24 hours or less
  6. What you must do with the subscribers box
  7. How to follow up after your launch, to make sure you are not left clueless ;)

... and much, much more!

So, you've read this far! Thank you.

The first video of this course (promotional), will let you see over my shoulder as I dive into my account and show you my earnings from my previous launch. This way, you can trust me and that's the first step to allowing me to teaching you my trade.

One final very important point.

In one week, you could either have your own money-generating product, or you could just be one week older.. what do you choose ?

Click the "take this course" button, top right, now ... every hour you delay is costing you money ...

Howard Lynch
title: Product Launch For The Non Technical Person - w/ Assignments
